nodes.text: The cruiser subsequently crashed on the remote desert planet Ponemah Terminal in its dangerous south polar region. The wreck, with Kix still alive in his cryo-cycle stasis pod inside, would not be discovered for over five decades until an ionic storm reactivated the Obrexta III's distress beacon. As the starship had become legendary over the intervening years for carrying a treasure known to be of great value to Count Dooku, a race broke out among several pirate bands to be the first to claim the ship's cargo.
